ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Administrative Monetary Penalties (Canada Labour Code) Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES (CANADA LABOUR CODE) REGULATIONS in order to amend Schedule I of the regulations to update the designated violations for Part XI to reflect the amendments to the Confined Spaces Regulations.
